name: Ring Bonney's Treasure
description:
Go in search of the treasure of famous pirate Ring Bonney Your parrot and your cards will greatly help you !
  • Play with x and with mouse (click and wheel)

Made by me in approximately 12 hours for TriJam#105: Islands ?

  • 3 hours for GameDesign, ideas and dialog
  • At least 2 hours struggling with Gdevelop (this is my fourth game with it)
  • 3 hours to search and create the different designs
  • 4 hours to actually code the game, and create the different design
